name: Draught Alcohol Free Stout Beer 0.0% vol 10x440ml Cans
description: Net Content0.440 Litres General Alcohol DataUnits 0.01Tasting Notes Smoothly balanced stout with bitter, sweet and roasted notes. Hints of coffee and chocolate aromasIngredientsWater, malted barley, barley, roast barley, fructose, natural flavourings, carbon dioxide, nitrogen and hops.FeaturesABOUT - Guinness Draught 0.0% Non-Alcoholic Beer is a non-alcoholic beer with the same beautifully smooth taste, perfectly balanced flavour and unique dark colour of Guinness, just without the alcohol. TASTING NOTES - Guinness Draught 0.0% Non-Alcoholic Beer's tasting notes include the sweetness of malt, the bitterness of hops and the unique Guinness roasted barley. HOW TO ENJOY - Guinness Draught 0.0% Non-Alcoholic Beer is best served chilled and poured slowly into a glass. AWARDS - The Guinness brand won seven awards at the prestigious World Beer Awards in 2019 aloneProduct InformationGuinness Draught 0.0% Non-Alcoholic Beer is a non-alcoholic beer with the same smooth taste, perfectly balanced flavour and unique dark colour of Guinness, without the alcohol. The brewing process starts just as it always has, but with Guinness 0.0% the alcohol is gently removed through a cold filtration method. This helps to preserve its natural flavour, ensuring that the all important sweetness of the malt, the bitterness of the hops and the unique Guinness roasted barley flavours are all perfectly balanced.Storage TypeAmbientManufacturer Address16 Great Marlborough Street,London,W1F 7HSASDA Product InformationFor Try Me Love Me products, read our Terms and Conditions.
